visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a pie chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have a white background with a light gray border. The pie slices should be colored with specific shades of blue, green, and red. The legend should be positioned at the bottom of the chart and styled with a larger font size and bold text. The chart should also have a button that, when clicked, removes the first data point from the series.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a pie chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart has a white background and a light gray border, giving it a clean and modern appearance. The pie slices are colored with specific shades of blue, green, and red, which are commonly associated with data visualization. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered, and styled with a larger font size and bold text to make it more readable. Additionally, the chart includes a button that, when clicked, removes the first data point from the series, allowing for interactive data manipulation.
